about_the_game:
Embark on a Treacherous Pilgrimage

For hundreds of years, the Mountain Folk have used their powers of Astral Projection to travel vast distances. But Mae is different–her spirit travel is limited by a tether.

Mae is of age to join a traditional pilgrimage to a sacred temple called the Fount of Souls. While her peers effortlessly make the journey by spirit flight, Mae is forced to take the long way. 

Join Mae in her valiant struggle to prove herself. Become master of your tether, conquer the many challenging obstacles on your path, and unlock the true power of the Fount of Souls.

Master Spirit Flight with Six Different Abilities

Progressively unlock new spirit abilities throughout the game. Gather and use different medicines to change how your spirit interacts with the environment.

Discover Hundreds of Hidden Secrets

Scour every corner for hidden rooms and alternate paths with advanced obstacles.

Explore Hub Areas and Interact with NPCs

Pass through villages filled with people you can talk to and several buildings you can enter. Learn more about the lore and discover Atropa Blossoms when you complete small quests for villagers.

Pure Platforming

No weapons, combat, monsters, powerups, or skill trees. Just pure, challenging platforming - designed around exploring new movement systems to achieve satisfying leaps and bounds across levels.

Tough but Forgiving

The levels are difficult, but checkpoints are frequent, allowing you to quickly learn through failure and use your practice to satisfyingly tackle each trial.

Speedrunner's Dream

By no means do you need to speedrun the game to enjoy it. However, for those who love speedrunning, this game is designed with you in mind with several unique ways to move more efficiently across each stage.
